description: This file defines a custom exception class `SimpleBankingGlobalException` used for handling exceptions in the project, extending RuntimeException and utilizing Lombok annotations for boilerplate code.

classes.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException
classes.description: A custom runtime exception class for global banking-related errors, with code and message fields.

methods.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor initializing the exception with a message.
